Ok, here's the options for the choice of the theme for the 1st monthly 
scenario contest:

1)the final battle between Mordred and King Arthur

2)the fall of Troy

3)battle at Helmsdeep

Sorry, no write-in themes.

* * *

Voting will be from May 5 (Monday) through May 9 (Friday) and will be 
done by sending an email to the group.

In the event of three way tie, I'll find a way to reduce the problem 
to a two-way tie.

In the event of a two way tie, a run-off will be held between the two 
on May 10 and May 11.

* * *

by May 18, I need to know who plans on participating so scenario 
numbers can be assigned to each entry in the contest (unless a better 
solution is offered).  Also, it should be understood after you submit 
a scenario for the contest, I plan on putting all the entries into a 
single zip file so that the entries can be distributed more easily.  
Don't worry: the zip file will list credits for the designer of each 
scenarios.
